title: How spending changes during retirement
text:
In order to know how much you need to save for retirement, you need to have an estimate for how much you will be spending. AJ Smith, Vice President of Content and Financial Education at SmartAsset, joined Yahoo Finance's Jen Rogers, Myles Udland, and Dan Roberts on 'The Final Round' to discuss the best ways to save and spend money during retirement. SmartAssest's retirement calculator helps you find a retirement plan that best suits you: smartasset.com/retirement/retirement-calculator

This segment is brought to you by Fidelity Investments.
